title: Simonrockman
author: Simonrockman
content: Hi,I've upgraded my mining operation form S9s to M30s and S19s. I'm looking to offload the S9s. I have around 200 units.Message me if interested.Simon

comments.author: Papillion
comments.created_time: May 18, 2023, 04:21:14 PMLast edit: May 26, 2023, 03:32:31 PM by Papillion
comments.body: do you accept escrow or lightcoin, any photographs of the equipment for the sub?s19's dont exist yet.
